imdb.plot outline: Some time in the summer Pete, Connor and Aymz graduate from university only to realise that a recession hit Britain has become a barren wasteland for work. Forced to live of Jobseekers Allowance, cheap cider, pot noodles and joined by Trent, Petes semi-special-trolley-boy-friend they find an abundance of stupid, strange, awkward and bad situations that will leave you feeling molested... But in a good way.
imdb.title: The Flop Shop
plot: Follows the antics of Pete, a bum on Jobseeker's Allowance and his three friends Connor, Trent and Aymz.::Flop Shop

Some time in the summer Pete, Connor and Aymz graduate from university only to realise that a recession hit Britain has become a barren wasteland for work. Forced to live of Jobseekers Allowance, cheap cider, pot noodles and joined by Trent, Petes semi-special-trolley-boy-friend they find an abundance of stupid, strange, awkward and bad situations that will leave you feeling molested... But in a good way.::Flop Shop
